did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 1 item, TMs, bound page proofs with autograph revisions, 2 volumes: p.1-166 and p.167-374, along with bookplate.

userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Manuscript of Kenneth Roberts, Accession #7952-c, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift on 1990 April 4.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a manuscript, 1947, for Kenneth Lewis Roberts' Moreau de St. Mery's American Journey [1793-1798], translated and edited by Kenneth Roberts and Anna M. Roberts, later published by Doubleday & Company, Inc., Garden City, New York.
